name: xXxAngleHacksxXx v.s. EVIL.inc
description:
Help AngleHacks infiltrate EVIL.inc to steal the datacore to save the metaverse!

Be careful though as EVIL.inc is quite aware of your plan and will send every last corpo to stop you.

It's cool though. You totally got this. Everything is perfectly balanced and you'll probably win after dealing with 10 whole levels of shooting fun!

...

One more thing.

This game was made in 48 hours following the Ludum Dare Compo rules where everything is done from scratch by one person! This is not a Ludum Dare submission though. This game was completed as a self challenge to get back into game development and programming with Unity.
